item.title: SCHMITT INDUSTRIES INC 10-K
item.description: SCHMITT INDUSTRIES INC, which is in the Industrial Instruments For Measurement, Display, And Control [3823] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 31, 2021 had 21410 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
